text: Dahu Park is a metro station in Taipei, Taiwan. It is a station on the Wenhu Line, whose station code is BR20. == Station layout information == The platforms are above ground level. Platform 1 is for Taipei Nangang Exhibition Center and Platform 2 is for Taipei Zoo. == Around the station == * Dahu Park * Hushan Park No. 5 * Dahu Cottage * Dahu Elementary School * Dahu Community * Bailusishan Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Dahu Park metro station
